Header: Stenson, Rahm share lead at Hero World Challenge
Content: Spaniard Jon Rahm carded nine-under-par 63 to surge into a share of the halfway lead with Henrik Stenson after the second round at the Hero World Challenge in the Bahamas.Swede Stenson shot a second-round 66 to match his European Ryder Cup team mate at 10-under 134, one shot ahead of Americans Dustin Johnson and Patrick Cantlay.Patrick Reed went from equal first to nearly last with a 77 that left him eight shots back.Tournament host Tiger Woods shot 69 to join Reed tied for 14th in the 18-man field.
